Title: Fathers and Sons
Writer: Graham Yost (developed for television by), Dave Andron, Elmore Leonard (based on the short story "Fire in the Hole" by), Wendy Calhoun (executive story editor), Chris Provenzano (executive story editor)
Actors: Timothy Olyphant, Nick Searcy, Joelle Carter, Jacob Pitts
Plot: The marshals are forced to turn to Arlo for help in making a case against Bo Crowder, but will he go along? Meanwhile, Bo is having problems of his own with Boyd, who continues to wage a religious war against his drug business.
